introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: SwipeScout ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our video recruitment platform and related services.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.accountInfo: Account Information: Name, email address, phone number, profile picture

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to SwipeScout! These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services.

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.content: As a user, you agree to provide accurate information, maintain the security of your account, and use the service in compliance with applicable laws.

intellectualProperty.content: All content and materials on the SwipeScout platform are owned by SwipeScout or our licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: SwipeScout uses cookies to enhance your experience on our platform. This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your choices regarding cookies.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are used to store small pieces of information. They are stored on your device when the website is loaded on your browser.

howSwipeScoutUsesCookies.title: How SwipeScout Uses Cookies
howSwipeScoutUsesCookies.content: When you use and access the Service, we may place a number of cookies files in your web browser. We use cookies for the following purposes: Authentication, Security, Performance, and Analytics.

yourChoices.title: Your Choices Regarding Cookies
yourChoices.content: If you prefer to avoid the use of cookies on the Service, you must first disable the use of cookies in your browser and then delete the cookies saved in your browser associated with this service.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At SwipeScout, we are committed to maintaining a respectful and inclusive community. These Community Guidelines outline the standards of behavior expected from all users.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree to use the Service only for purposes that are legal and in accordance with these Community Guidelines. You must not use the Service in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the Service.

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.content: You are solely responsible for your interactions with other users of the Service. We reserve the right to monitor disputes between you and other users and to terminate your account if you violate these guidelines.
